text: sorry, completely missed this - managed to get it working but can't remember what I did!
Is there any page performance degradation as you approach the hubdb technical limit of 10,000 rows? Or is a page with a small table as performant as a page with a large table?
From a dynamic CRM custom object page I want a user to fill in a form and that will create a new deal associated with both the user and the custom object, does anyone know if that’s possible?
Or do I need to start using the API’s
Are you talking about dynamic page built from that table?
I think you will need to use APIs. unless some other folks any other way
I have seen folks using HubSpot serverless functions to make those API calls
The main listing page. Not the dynamic pages.

Hey everyone! I embedded a HubSpot meeting link on my page and when I look at my Google Analytics instead of attributing the conversion to Youtube or Facebook it says that the source is this (see image). How can I change that?

I am using HubDB for the first time to create dynamic pages. I am following <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/dynamic-pages/hubdb> .. I was able to create the "list" page successfully .. but `row.hs_path` seems empty and the related pages don't seem to exist either.  see here <http://24904016.hs-sites-eu1.com/categories> .. note I ended up using `<a href="{{ request.path }}/{{ row.name }}">{{ row.emoji }} {{ row.name }}</a>` ie `row.name` to get the URL to point to a child page but the child pages 404 (ie. <http://24904016.hs-sites-eu1.com/categories/inclusive>). I guess I must enable some additional setting ..?
I guess this setting here is just if I have a table with a ForeignID, right?

ah figured it out .. I had added a "Page Path" and "Page Title" column manually but those are automatically generated when enabling dynamic pages .. so those automatically generated columns where empty .. works now

If you really have close to 10K records, HubL function make take extra few 100 ms so data retrieval may not be a problem but if you are rendering all 10K in the listing page, I have seen DOM rendering a bit slower though in the past..
<@U7SL518D6> Do u know anything about this?

alright .. this is working .. now the question: how do I leverage one of the existing templates I have bought <https://inboundelements.com/HubSpot-templates/elements-HubSpot-theme/> to create a dynamic page. not quite sure how to pass content into `dnd_module`

Haven't seen someone ask about this before but it seems like you're likely using the meeting link directly. You could use the meetings module to embed the meeting tool inside a website page or landing page, then the page will get the referrer data. You can additionally use the analytics tool's tracking link feature to add UTM code to the URL that you place on your youtube to help communicate where the traffic is coming from for attribution.
